mdRecord.dcterms:title: Law School Law Day 1964
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Thompson, Ralph R.
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Law School alumni, hosts' dinner. Identified: Mrs. Lacey Virginia Barkley Harrison (third from left); Albertis S. Harrison, Jr., Class of 1928, Governor of Virginia [1962-1968] (fourth from left); Frances Farmer, Law Librarian (seventh from left) and Michael B. Wagenheim, Class of 1922 (eigth from left)
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Visual History Collection
